## Background panel

```{r}
background <- c(
  "header" = "Abstract",
  "title" = "**Introduction**",
  "body" = "This shiny has been generated with [omopViewer](https://github.com/oxford-pharmacoepi/omopViewer).",
  "title" = "**Methods**",
  "paragraph" = "Methods example, with a footer* example.",
  "footer" = "*Here is the footer."
)
tdir <- here::here()
exportStaticApp(directory = tdir, logo = NULL, background = background, open = FALSE)
```
